title: How to forward complaints?
intro: Each type of product requires a specific complaint procedure. Click on each category to see the details:

accordion.food_intro: Exchange occurs only when the product is unfit for consumption.
accordion.food_l1: Customer must bring product + receipt to the store
accordion.food_l3: Correct filling of Reason, Brand and Batch is essential
accordion.nonfood_intro: Must be registered with all information about the defect.
accordion.nonfood_box: Customer brings product + receipt to the store (except Appliances ‚Üí Technical Assistance).
accordion.wrong_intro: If the customer bought the product in the wrong size, color or voltage:
accordion.wrong_l1: Non-perishables: item cannot be opened/used. Customer goes to store with product + receipt.
accordion.wrong_attention: ‚ö†Ô∏è Perishables once removed from the store cannot be reconditioned due to food safety issues.
accordion.notdone_intro: If the customer reports they went to the store and the exchange was not completed:
accordion.notdone_l1: Check if there's a previous record with management position
accordion.notdone_l2: If there isn't, inform that the case will be forwarded for verification
accordion.notdone_l3: If management position denies the exchange, maintain company guidance and close

quiz.question: A customer calls saying they bought a dress in the wrong size and wants to exchange it. It's sealed with tags. Where do you register and what do you advise?
quiz.opt_a: A) Register in COMPLAINT > EXCHANGE and advise to go to the store.
quiz.opt_b: B) Register in INFORMATION > PURCHASES > PRODUCT EXCHANGE and advise to go to the store with product + receipt.
quiz.opt_c: C) Inform that since there's no defect, there's no possibility of exchange.
quiz.opt_d: D) Inform about the 7-day withdrawal right and process the return.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Exchange for wrong purchase goes in INFORMATION > PURCHASES > PRODUCT EXCHANGE.
